name: LD34 (c: Games)
description:
*Headphones Recommended*

Arc is a Simple, Classic, ARCade Game. Escape from your Arc before it closes on you! Don't crash into another Arc though. Dash to another Arc for score, and collect Gold for extra score. Get the Power Ups, but watch out for the Power Downs. The Power Ups and Power Downs are filled circles but with each one a different color. Which one is which you ask? Figure it out yourself. c:

Instructions: Left, Right, Up, and Down Arrow Keys to move, and P to Pause.
